name: validation_matrix

missing_data_check.description: Detects missing or insufficient signal data.

rules.notes: Prevents overconfident interpretation from sparse inputs.

signal_vector_alignment_check.description: Ensures routed signals correspond correctly to activated vectors.

rules.notes: If signals map to dimensions not activated in vectors, internal conflict is flagged.

motive_vector_consistency_check.description: Ensures dominant motives and dominant vectors do not contradict each other.

rules.notes: Cross-validates motives against vector states for psychological realism.

stress_conflict_interaction_check.description: Detects when stress levels and conflict patterns do not match psychologically.

rules.notes: Corrects inconsistencies between emotional intensity and conflict activation.

identity_integrity_check.description: Ensures identity construction outputs do not contradict survival or emotional vectors.

rules.notes: Ensures identity-related outputs remain structurally cohesive.

reduce_confidence.description: Applies global confidence penalty if multiple validation failures occur.

force_conflict_activation.description: Triggers conflict engine if contradictions accumulate.

notes: The Validation Matrix ensures coherence, realism, and structural integrity across the entire psychological engine before final output.
